VREyeParametersRenderHeight.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The renderHeight read-only property of the interface describes the recommended render target height of each eye viewport, in pixels.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This is already in device pixel units, so there's no need to multiply by Window.devicePixelRatio before setting to HTMLCanvasElement.height.

-WebVR API homepage
- â€” demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.

VREyeParametersRenderHeight.value: A number, representing the height in pixels.
